recipe.title: Speedy Apple Pie
recipe.source: Eat Georgia Grown, by Sara J. Pritschet, MS, RD https://foodtalk.org/content/sara-pritschet-credit-statement
recipe.description: A quick and healthy alternative to satisfy an apple pie craving.
recipe.instructions:
Mix diced apples with cinnamon and sugar. Split apple into two mugs or microwave safe bowls. Microwave for 3 minutes. 
	Crush graham cracker sheet with butter. Top each mug with graham cracker crumbles and microwave for another minute. Serve hot.
recipe.notes:
Tips

  • Diced apples can be stored in the fridge for 3-4 days.
  • Add a few drops of lemon juice to keep apples from browning.

Nutritional Information

150 calories, 3g fat, 33g carb, 5g fiber, 60mg sodium, 4% vitamin C, 2% iron, 15% calcium
